page.title: 10CLUBS
page.content: CLUBS. Girls can join the Brownies(8-10)or Guides (over 10),and boys can become Cubs(8-10)or Scouts(over10).There is also a football club for training young boys and a cricket club. Adults have the choice of a number of flourishing clubs:- The cricket club has a full programme of matches each season. There is a keen tennis club. Over 60's meet regularly. Churt Amateur Dramatic Society produces plays and revues regularly. The Horticultural Society holds seasonal shows as well as making visits to gardens of special interest There are two Women's Institutes,each meeting at a different time. A Yacht Club holds races on Frensham Pond. There is also a Working Men's Club.
